page.title: 11Games at St. Catherine's
page.content: Lacrosse is a girls' game and it is played mainly in Surrey. It is played by a team of 12. Each has a stick which has a long wooden handle with a net at one end. The net is used for catching and throwing a hard rubber ball. There is a goal at either end like a small football goal. You can go anywhere within a certain limit. You are allowed to run with the ball in the net of your stick. You score a goal by throwing the ball into your team's goal using your lacrosse stick. Other games played are netball, rounders and tennis. We also do gym and athletics and we have our own swimming pool. We have six Houses and there are many inter-house competitions. We also have outings and entertain people and make money for charities in our houses.
